/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and vans are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy nature of the area. A blue fence runs along the right side of the street, adding a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the street below.
